title: (x) Best Female Performance - Cooper Black w/Swatches {Richard Hards}
content: very popular now a days. it should be easy ![70s font](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41313.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Could also be ( an alternate version of ) ' [Goudy Heavyface Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944/http:/www.linotype.com/8175/goudyheavyfaceitalic-font.html)', maybe..   
 [http://www.linotype.com/8175/goudyheavyfaceitalic-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944/http:/www.linotype.com/8175/goudyheavyfaceitalic-font.html)   
   
Edit.: Well, Hmm, Sorry, No, its not.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
So, maybe there is an alternate 'Swash' version of 'Cooper Black Italic'..

_You just have to loooooove Google.: ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)_   
   
 [Ian Lynam](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944/http:/www.ianlynam.com/).: ' [Cooper Black Swash Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944/http:/www.ianlynam.com/cbsi.html)'..   
 [www.ianlynam.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120723104944/http:/www.ianlynam.com/)

Definitly looks like Cooper black ital with swash swash alternates   
Same as used on 70's 'Emanuelle movie poster (+ many other 70s porn flicks)   
Tried to get it myself to no avail...had to render characters in illustrator if you know find it in digital I'd be interested to know where

It looks like a version of Cooper Black with swashes to me.   
   
Letraset used to do a Bookman with those caps.   
   
Is it just me, or do the "m"s look a bit clumsy?
